transition_script.description: The script file containing the transitions between seats in this collection.

passengers.description: If there are any passengers set, they will get spawned and set at the specified seat when the collection is spawned.

transition_with_root_motion.description: [bool]EXPERIMENTAL: Activate root motion when doing seat transitions. This can be useful if we want bots to jump out of cars.

should_passenger_inherit_node_velocity_o.description: [bool]If set, will take the passengers node velocity upon exit and inherit into motion.

ignore_entrance_check.description: [bool]Should we ignore any logic in regards to the entrance updating?

play_music_events.description: [bool]If true then entering this vehicle triggers music events for the local player

stratagem_use_allowed.description: [bool]If true then the players should be able to use stratagem inside the vehicle.

can_manually_leave.description: [bool]If we can exit the seat collection via manual player input or not.

hide_seater_nameplate.description: [bool]Whether to hide a player's nameplate when in this seat collection.
